document.heading: Heights on Georgia Avenue Tax Exemption Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-124, the “Heights on Georgia Avenue Tax Exemption Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-45, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 15, 2009, and January 5, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 25, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-286 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-124 became effective on March 23, 2010.
